title: markvin
author: markvin
content: 3. Mates, wanna try working with one firm engaged in trading on the crypto market. They use bots with AI. The profit is promised to be real good in general. Maybe someone knows smth about them? Here's the link ro their site: https://intelfin.io/

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: What are you looking for specifically, is it developers, marketers, parties that gain valuable content.etc?What are your areas of work, mining, savings, solar energy? How to pay (in Bitcoin or another currency)Have you studied the market situation because the time is not ideal for launching new projects?

comments.author: markvin
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on July 02, 2022, 08:03:49 PMWhat are you looking for specifically, is it developers, marketers, parties that gain valuable content.etc?What are your areas of work, mining, savings, solar energy? How to pay (in Bitcoin or another currency)Have you studied the market situation because the time is not ideal for launching new projects?I'm looking where I can invest money because real estate bussiness is not good anymore

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Stupid attempt to promote a SCAM website. DO NOT INVEST IN WHAT OP IS SUGGESTING.SCAMSCAMSCAMSCAMSCAM

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on July 03, 2022, 10:33:01 PMI'm looking where I can invest money because real estate bussiness is not good anymoreMan, real estate is one of the best businesses and investments. How can you prove that it's no longer good? Unless you're living in a place where it's not really ideal, location is the key to it.Aside from real estate, there's no need to go that far for you to look for another investment. You're in a bitcoin forum and you know where you can invest better and that's with bitcoin.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: That doesn't seems to be a legit AI trading platform. that platform has been offering a non sense thing like a huge monhtly ROI for your investment which has a very big chance to be another scam token. that's a scam website that is pretty similar to the ponzi scheme but used AI as a new idea to attract people to invest in this shitty platform. I don't know what's your main purpose but if you are only wanna promoting the scam platform like that and this is not a good place.

comments.author: BlockchainMentors
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on July 03, 2022, 10:33:01 PMQuote from: hugeblack on July 02, 2022, 08:03:49 PMWhat are you looking for specifically, is it developers, marketers, parties that gain valuable content.etc?What are your areas of work, mining, savings, solar energy? How to pay (in Bitcoin or another currency)Have you studied the market situation because the time is not ideal for launching new projects?I'm looking where I can invest money because real estate bussiness is not good anymoreHow can you prove that ? Cryptocurrency real estate is still very profitable and very secure as the value of cryptocurrency can change quickly. This means that bitcoin may decline in value or rise in price. You never know what could happen. However, buying an asset is equivalent to trading a volatile asset for a more secure one.

comments.author: adzino
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on July 02, 2022, 11:53:33 AM3. Mates, wanna try working with one firm engaged in trading on the crypto market. They use bots with AI. The profit is promised to be real good in general. Maybe someone knows smth about them? Here's the link ro their site: https://intelfin.io/Lol, if the "profits are promised" then why do they have to "sell it to the users"? Why don't they trade themselves and make all those profits? Because, no, the profits aren't guaranteed nor are they promised. Hence they sell their "bots"/"platforms" to their users where they charge some small fees for every trade executed. So yeah, it is a promised profit for the owners of the platform, not the users. They earn all those profits without taking any risks.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: problemsolver01 on July 14, 2022, 01:01:04 AMwww.bitminecycle.comAll the sites you share look like kid's toy stores, they fit better in the trash.Nice nickname, but pls solve your own poverty problem first to make you look more promising even though you'll scam them.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on July 03, 2022, 10:33:01 PMQuote from: hugeblack on July 02, 2022, 08:03:49 PMWhat are you looking for specifically, is it developers, marketers, parties that gain valuable content.etc?What are your areas of work, mining, savings, solar energy? How to pay (in Bitcoin or another currency)Have you studied the market situation because the time is not ideal for launching new projects?I'm looking where I can invest money because real estate bussiness is not good anymoreWhy not good that investment option cannot be replaced by any other investment because by looking at real estate industry they are totally doing fine even the pandemic hit globally. Maybe try to research more since for sure you can learn a lot of things in real estate if you are really willing to learn about it. Also the site you link here us obviously scam so I guess you better not to try because scammers offer promising profits so that they can scam people.

comments.author: bounty786
comments.body: Right now many coins are dumped so many crypto coins are really good to invest at at this moment. Investment depends on either long term holdings or short term holding, for me when it comes to long term investment I invest in the top coins on coinmarketcap because these coins are among what makes cryptocurrency what it is today. While for the short term investment I invest in low sat coins which have little awareness on the market and once am able to make a little profit I sell off till I see other ones. To me I believe each trader has his/her own mode of investment and the best thing is to always follow your instinct.

comments.author: Tutte
comments.body: Your way of seeking for advice for your investment is a bit wired. From the tone of the thread it sounds like you are completely new but seeing your post says the opposite, if you are looking to lure victims to this website I hope you will fail on the attempt, hopefully gullible newbies must have read all the post above to avoid the website.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: markvin on July 03, 2022, 10:33:01 PMQuote from: hugeblack on July 02, 2022, 08:03:49 PMWhat are you looking for specifically, is it developers, marketers, parties that gain valuable content.etc?What are your areas of work, mining, savings, solar energy? How to pay (in Bitcoin or another currency)Have you studied the market situation because the time is not ideal for launching new projects?I'm looking where I can invest money because real estate bussiness is not good anymoreInstead of putting money in an unknown investment that has a high chance of turning into scam why not invest part of that money (if not all) on btc, to me, it will be the best investment for you considering how cheap the price is now and the likelihood of a much higher price in years to come. Investment is not all about get rich quick, most of such investment don't usually last long, if you are prepared to take such risk with your money you are at liberty to do so, but since you ask for help am giving it to you freely without any cost.
